content: I just posted https://github.com/rust-lang/rustc-dev-guide/pull/1249 to add a little more documentation on compiletest, but I noticed that there is a bit of information that is lacking (from a high level), and the compiletest documentation is not organized as well as I think it could be. Would anyone be interested if I made a PR to reorganize it slightly, and to provide some more content on what the tests are?
I think that would certainly be useful.
Feel free to r? me, I'm not familiar with all the suites, but I worked with compiletest quite a bit.

Would anyone be interested if I made a PR to reorganize it slightly, and to provide some more content on what the tests are?

Sounds good to me!
Thanks @Eric Huss ! I suggested a few edits.
